name: HorizontalAlignment
desc: An alignment position along the horizontal axis.

items.name: static let leading: HorizontalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the leading edge of the view.

items.name: static let center: HorizontalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the horizontal center of the view.

items.name: static let trailing: HorizontalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the trailing edge of the view.

items.name: init(AlignmentID.Type)
items.desc: Creates an instance with the given identifier.

items.name: static func == (HorizontalAlignment, HorizontalAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two horizontal alignments are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two horizontal alignments are unequal.
